entry.title: Good Luck, Babe.
entry.summary:
Author: teklarn

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 54,119Chapters: 15/?Kudos: 230

Summary: Born as the heir to a dirty fortune and nothing more, since you could walk you’ve known you’d marry someone for the sake of carrying on your family’s legacy. Trying to find love was never forbidden―it was simply out of the question. There was no point in finding it when you were betrothed to a complete stranger. As the prized and only daughter of Roman Sionis, otherwise known as the infamous crime lord Black Mask, what choice was there to make?Mafia boss Bruce Wayne strikes a deal with your father―join your two incredibly powerful and wealthy families by marrying off the soul heirs. That would be you, and Bruce Wayne’s adopted ‘golden son,’ Richard Grayson.The first time you meet Dick, he’s nothing short of a typical rich kid. Polite in all the ways that mattered, a little arrogant and a little flashy for your taste, but cute nonetheless. But when you meet Dick’s bodyguard, Jason Todd―a reformed criminal paying off his debt to the Wayne’s―everything changes. Jason is handsome, aloof, dangerous, everything you aren’t allowed to have.And now, he’s suddenly everything you want.

entry.title: What we do in the shadows
entry.summary:
Author: WholesomeSewerRat

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,174Chapters: 1/20Kudos: 3

Summary: Kidnapped and auctioned off. Yikes! But oh, yay, rich boy Dick Grayson is here to save the day. Jason watches from the shadows, enraged at how close Dick is getting to his girl. Not that she knows.I dunno, mostly crack fr. I think I'm hilarious, but feel free to prove me wrong. Lots of OOC, I don't think I've picked up a Batman comic since I was like 15, dude.Also, I did not edit this, so punctuation be damned, and I genuinely can't spell to save my life. Lastly, short as hell chapters.

entry.title: O, Weaver of Lazarus
entry.summary:
Author: fyodvvr

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,263Chapters: 1/35Kudos: 4

Summary: 3 years after making a deal with a disabled man you end up rediscovering the field of medicine. While seeking to recover from permanent amnesia you find yourself transferred from a local ER to Gotham's General Hospital - the life you thought you had established crumbles.Unlike most people your everyday life is filled with strings, though unlike the ones in books, which tie soulmates together, you view people's soul strings as they shift, tangle, coil within, or unwind from their bodies.With strange dreams becoming more frequent you slowly come to learn more about your past self and the things you've done. Along the way you meet... people, strange though they are you can't shake the creeping feeling of having met them before and neither can they. Will you come to remember before it is too late? Or will you succumb to madness trying to?

entry.title: Foamless Waves, Weightless Shapes, Falling Flames
entry.summary:
Author: forgotten_totoro

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,828Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 156

Summary: Finally living after the death of your best friend, you receive a call for help from his brother, forcing you to return to Gotham. Batman is dead, Dick is crumbling, Tim has disappeared and there is a 10-year old assassin child confused, angry and very, very stabby. On top of that, there is a new crime lord in town, making seemingly targeted attacks on the family you are hopelessly involved in, despite your best efforts. Only problem is, you've always been more perceptive than you'd like, and suddenly you are being reminded of your Jason at every turn.She/her pronouns are used for the reader, however I am happy to change it to gender neutral pronouns if there's enough interest! Let me know.

entry.title: Did You Talk Back To Fucking Batman??
entry.summary:
Author: Ava_Mae

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,462Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 80

Summary: The fire escape door slammed open with a loud, "Did you fuckin' talk back to fuckin' Batman??"Jay's voice barely even caught you off guard anymore. You didn't bother to glance over your shoulder as he came inside, just continued with balancing the hot pizza pan as you pulled it out of the oven. "So what if I did? And don't break my patio door!""You do know that's stupid and reckless, right?"You let out a snort. "What, as opposed to when you do it? At least I didn't try to punch him."
